channel.title: Add pickup command
channel.description:
Ok i think i know how to do this, but just to make sure... How do you add the pickup command??
Thanks for telling me.
Also where do you put it?
in Client.java??

item.title: Add pickup command
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Josh21210, post:7, topic:260652”]I didnt say i tryed or i did try…

Yes i did try, but i found out that it didnt work how i tryed it so i posted…[/quote]You need to be more discriptive and try to work with us. What errors did you get when you tried using things from another source? It’s possible that it’s only something small that we can help you adjust to.

item.title: Add pickup command
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You would put it under:

private void customCommand(String command) {

Along with the rest of the custom commands.

To create a pickup code, you’re going to need to know how to start and if statement, use substrings, refer to itemIds using addItem, and basic knowledge. You should try looking at sources that already have it so that you have a good idea how it works. Exploring is the best way to learn.

Read full topic
